thread.title: Laid-back Lodi kayak outings explore the water as the sun sets
thread.title_full: Laid-back Lodi kayak outings explore the water as the sun sets - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Maggie Creamer
title: Laid-back Lodi kayak outings explore the water as the sun sets
text:
Photo: Preston Gannaway, Special To The Chronicle 8544228|article-6481769|7 8544228|article-6481769|1 email_share_embed|photo-8544228|article-6481769|1 8544228|article-6481769|2 8544228|article-6481769|3 8544228|article-6481769|4 8544228|article-6481769|5 google_share_embed|photo-8544228|article-6481769|6 The explorers wind up their outing at one of the weekly sunset kayak paddles run by Headwaters Kayak in Lodi. The Wednesday outings go on through September on the smooth waters of the Mokelumne River and Lodi Lake, with plenty of sightings of wildlife in the natural setting. The explorers wind up their outing at one of the weekly sunset...
The water appears almost still as Trang Nguyen’s kayak glides along the glistening Mokelumne River on a hot summer afternoon in Lodi. The explorers wind up their outing at one of the weekly sunset kayak paddles run by Headwaters Kayak in Lodi. The Wednesday outings go on through September on the smooth waters of the Mokelumne River and Lodi Lake, with plenty of sightings of wildlife in the natural setting. The explorers wind up their outing at one of the weekly sunset...
The water appears almost still as Trang Nguyen’s kayak glides along the glistening Mokelumne River on a hot summer afternoon in Lodi.
